alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 01 at 3:07PM AKST until February 02 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST WEDNESDAY THROUGH THOMPSON PASS... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Thompson Pass. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to one half mile or less at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will continue to be gusty through the day Wednesday and any transportable snow on the ground may result in periods of reduced visibilities.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
